get.description:
Get list of creative standard dimensions, video player sizes and creative durations.

* * *

List all Ad categories for targeting drop down.
***
#### Response Body Detail
|  **Field**     		|  **Type** 	|  **Description**                                  |
|-----------------------|---------------|---------------------------------------------------|
| id     				| number      	| adcategory id 									|	
| name 					| string 		| adcategory name 									|
| group 				| string 		| adcategory group name 							|
| iab_id 				| string 		| IAB Id											|
| parent_id 			| number 		| parent adcategory id								|

List all timezone for targeting.
***
#### Response Body Detail
|  **Field**     		|  **Type** 	|  **Description**                                  |
|-----------------------|---------------|---------------------------------------------------|
| id     				| number      	| id 												|	
| name 					| string 		| name 												|
| label 				| string 		| Used to show on UI 								|

| dma_region 			| string 		| DMA region 										|
| dma_source 			| string 		| DMA source 										|

post.summary: This API provides list of zip codes.
post.description: Get the list of zip codes with state ids for given filters.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authorization Bearer Token

parameters.name: X-IAA-OW-ID
parameters.description: Organization Workspace Id Header

requestBody.description:
**Request Body Details:**

| **Field** | **Type** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| pageNo `[optional]` | Number | Page number for the required data. The default value is 1. |
| noOfEntries `[optional]` | Number | The maximum number of returned results per page. Default value is 300.|
| sortBy `[optional]` | String | Sort the result set by specific field. For ascending use plus(+) sign(ascii value '%2B') and for descending use minus(-) sign. Sorting supported on `id`, `name` fields.|
| searchField `[optional]` | String | Search the result by provided keyword in the searchField. Search zips by `name` or `id`.|
| ids `[optional]` | Array of Integer | selected zip (segmented id) List, zip (segmented id) with provided ids will be returned first compared to other records. |
| parentSegmentIds `[optional]` | Array of Integer | Filter a list of zip codes based on their associated state id, where the state is considered the parent of each zip code. The state id should be taken from  [states](?path=/Master%20API/getStatesSegmentDetails) |
| segmentIds `[optional]` | Array of Integer | zip list filter by segmented ids. |
| zipCodes `[optional]` | Array of String | zip list filter by zip codes. |

post.summary: This API provides list of states.
post.description: Get a paginated list of state segment based on the provided filters.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authorization Bearer Token

parameters.name: X-IAA-OW-ID
parameters.description: Organization Workspace Id Header

requestBody.description:
**Request Body Details:**

| **Field** | **Type** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- |
|
| pageNo `[optional]` | Number | Page number for the required data. The default value is 1. |
| noOfEntries `[optional]` | Number | The maximum number of returned results per page. Default value is 300.|
| sortBy `[optional]` | String | Sort the result set by specific field. For ascending use plus(+) sign(ascii value '%2B') and for descending use minus(-) sign. Default value is -id.|
| searchField `[optional]` | String | Search the result by provided keyword in the searchField. search state records by `name` |
| campaignId `[optional]` | Number | State records associated with the provided campaign will be returned first, prioritized over other state records.|
| parentSegmentIds `[optional]` | Array of Integer | state list filter by country id. country is parent of state.|
| ids `[optional]` | Array of Integer | selected state id List, states with provided ids will be returned first compared to other records.
| segmentIds `[optional]` | Array of Integer | state list filter by state ids.

post.summary: This API provides list of senate districts.
post.description: Get a paginated list of senate districts segment based on the provided filters.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authorization Bearer Token

parameters.name: X-IAA-OW-ID
parameters.description: Organization Workspace Id Header

requestBody.description:
**Request Body Details:**

| **Field** | **Type** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- |
|
| pageNo `[optional]` | Number | Page number for the required data. The default value is 1. |
| noOfEntries `[optional]` | Number | The maximum number of returned results per page. Default value is 300.|
| sortBy `[optional]` | String | Sort the result set by specific field. For ascending use plus(+) sign(ascii value '%2B') and for descending use minus(-) sign. Default value is -id.|
| searchField `[optional]` | String | Search the result by provided keyword in the searchField. search senate district records by `name` |
| campaignId `[optional]` | Number | Senate district records associated with the provided campaign will be returned first, prioritized over other senate district records.|
| parentSegmentIds `[optional]` | Array of Integer | Filter a list of senate district based on their associated state id, where the state is considered the parent of each senate district. The state id should be taken from [states](?path=/Master%20API/getStatesSegmentDetails) |
| ids `[optional]` | Array of Integer | Selected senate district id List, senate district with provided ids will be returned first compared to other records.
| segmentIds `[optional]` | Array of Integer | senate district list filter by senate district ids.

requestBody.description:

| **Field** | **Type** | **Description** |

|
| pageNo `[optional]` | Number | Page number for the required data. The default value is 1. Setting the page number to -1 will disable pagination and return all data in a single page.|
| noOfEntries `[optional]` | Number | The maximum number of returned results per page. Default value is 300.|
| sortBy `[optional]` | String | Sort the result set by specific field. For ascending use plus(+) sign(ascii value '%2B') and for descending use minus(-) sign. Default value is -id.|
| searchField `[optional]` | String | Search the result by provided keyword in the searchField. search inventory records by `id`, `name` |
| ids `[optional]` | Array of Integer | Selected inventory id List, inventories with provided ids will be returned first compared to other records.|
| publisherIds `[optional]` | Array of Integer | Filter inventory list by publisher ids. |
| inventoryIds `[optional]` | Array of Integer | Filter inventory list by inventory ids. |

parameters.description: [optional] Page number for the required data. The default value is 1.

parameters.name: noOfEntries
parameters.description: [optional] The maximum number of returned results per page. The default value is 20 and the maximum value is 500.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: [optional] Sort the result set by specific field.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: [optional] Sorting order Supported values: `asc` or `desc`. The default value is `asc`.

parameters.name: searchField
parameters.description: [optional] Search the result by provided keyword in the searchField. It filters records by id, name.

parameters.name: campaignId
parameters.description: [optional] segment list associated with campaign id.

parameters.name: segmentIds
parameters.description: [optional] segment list filter by segmented ids.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: [optional] selected segmented id List, segments with provided ids will be returned first compared to other records.

parameters.name: X-IAA-OW-ID
parameters.description: Organization Workspace Id Header

get.description: This endpoint is used to fetch the list of districts by states. It supports filtering by state IDs and district type.

parameters.name: stateIds
parameters.description: Ids of states used to filter the districts data

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of districts to be fetched. It can be from `congressional`, `senate`, and `house`

parameters.name: searchStr
parameters.description: Search the result by provided keyword in the searchField.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authorization Bearer Token

parameters.name: X-IAA-OW-ID
parameters.description: Organization Workspace Id Header
